code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{AppContext}from'../context/AppContext';var RemainingBudget=function RemainingBudget(){var _useContext=useContext(AppContext),expenses=_useContext.expenses,budget=_useContext.budget;var totalExpenses=expenses.reduce(function(total,item){return total+=item.cost;},0);var alertType=totalExpenses>budget?'alert-danger':'alert-success';return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{class:"alert p-4 ".concat(alertType)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",null,"Remaining: Rs ",budget-totalExpenses));};export default RemainingBudget;
